backend/main.mo: Backend actor implementing access control, user approval, invite-only mode, user profiles, and match-related types with various query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text providing short summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference.
frontend/docs/v48-modecard-resume-button: Documentation describing a UI-only change to reorder Start and Resume buttons in ModeCard.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React application and mounting it to the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes, error boundaries, layout, and authentication gate.
frontend/src/components/accepting-gifts/: React component displaying a table of Accepting Gifts win/loss performance by ball count.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Circular ball button component that displays ball number, state styling, and accessibility label, invoking a click handler.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Provides ball state labels, ball values, and rack total calculations including one‑away 9‑ball adjustments.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Manages rack scoring logic including ball states, inning flow, auto‑dead rules, and emits rack-complete or live updates.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays match results with winner info, points, stats, and formatted PPI and match‑point outcome.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Form for creating or editing a real APA match with validation, identity checks, and save/update mutations.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Hook managing active player, shared innings, and inning transitions with helpers for scoring flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication and access‑control wrapper that handles login, loading states, and invite‑only restrictions.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button tied to Internet Identity with automatic session clearing and retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Manages a dialog for creating or editing a user profile, handling identity state, backend readiness, and form submission.
frontend/src/components/history/MatchHis: Renders a match history table with row selection and bulk deletion, including confirmation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation buttons, connection indicators, and footer.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Provides a delete button with a confirmation dialog to remove a single match and navigate after deletion.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Shows a reusable confirmation dialog for ending a match with customizable text and loading state.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Displays a summary card for a match, generating mode-specific labels and result text.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Shows a selectable mode card with start and optional resume actions, reflecting in‑progress sessions.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Renders APA performance line charts by merging and sorting datapoints, showing trends for PPI, aPPI, and related metrics.
frontend/src/components/straight-shot/St: Builds a frequency histogram from shot counts and displays it using a bar chart.
Displays a summary table of straight-shot results with wins, losses, and first win dates.
Shows shot-count trends over time with a composed bar/line chart and average calculation.
frontend/src/dev/straight-shot-spot-chec: Manual QA checklist ensuring Straight Shot functionality works after changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor via React Query, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Provides a helper to clear and refetch the actor query for retrying actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating match data, profiles, and other backend fields using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Defines the 12-level Accepting Gifts progression, utilities for clamping and retrieving levels, and rules for updating the baseline level after a match.
Provides session state structure and helpers to apply attempt results and advance sets without altering baseline level.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts cleaned APA practice and official match stats per player, producing PPI/aPPI and related datapoints.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Maps APA skill levels to points-to-win values and includes helpers for validation and formatted output.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Defines the 20-point APA match point conversion chart and structures used to determine outcomes based on loser SL and points.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaPracticeMatchOut: Computes APA Practice match outcomes by determining the loser, mapping points to a 20-point result, and assigning match points.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Implements APA rack scoring utilities, PPI calculation, rack validation, and aggregation of per-player stats.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaSkillLevelPredic: Predicts APA skill levels from PPI and aPPI using predefined numeric ranges.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaExpected: Provides the official expected PPI lookup table and helpers to bucket win% and fetch expected PPI for skill levels.
Determines APA match outcome based on skill levels and scores, returning win, loss, or unknown. Also exposes a helper that falls back to derived outcome when didWin is undefined.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Computes official APA PPI and aPPI, plus win percentage context for matches. Includes validation helpers and logic integrating outcome and expected PPI tables.
frontend/src/lib/history/matchHistoryRow: Generates human‑readable match result strings for various match modes. Handles APA official logs, practice matches, Accepting Gifts, and Straight Shot.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Parses match date strings and determines effective timestamps for sorting. Prefers user‑entered APA log dates when valid and formats them for display.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Builds Official APA match log records and derives didWin from scores and skill levels. Re‑exports other match builders.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Creates APA 9‑Ball practice match records, computing targets, outcomes, and player stats. Includes a UUID generator and point‑to‑win lookup.
frontend/src/lib/session/inProgressSessi: Manages sessionStorage state for in‑progress sessions per match mode. Provides helpers to query, clear, and list active sessions.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsPer: Aggregates Accepting Gifts win/loss counts by starting ball count levels 2–7. Processes final set scores to determine outcomes.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsSta: Computes summary stats for Accepting Gifts sessions, including total sessions and rolling average of ending object ball counts.
Aggregates APA official match stats including win rate, average PPI, and average aPPI. Uses PPI/aPPI calculators and win‑rate extraction.
frontend/src/lib/stats/straightShotStats: Computes straight-shot stats from match data including averages, trends, histogram, and win/loss summary. Filters straight-shot matches and calculates rolling and lifetime metrics.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider. Renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Handles the Accepting Gifts game loop including session loading, scoring, set progression, and match saving. Manages UI state such as dialogs and retry logic.
Shows the rules and structure of the Accepting Gifts drill including levels, scoring, and progression.
Start page for Accepting Gifts that loads profile and baseline level, configures a new session, or resumes an existing one.
Loads and manages APA practice match state, handles rack scoring, persistence, completion, and match saving.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Collects player names, skill levels, and notes to initialize a new APA practice game with session handling.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Fetches an existing official APA match and displays a form for editing its recorded details.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Provides a form to manually create an official APA match log after the match is finished.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Shows an access-denied screen and allows users to request approval to use the app.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Displays detailed information for a specific match, including APA stats, metadata, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Shows match history with sorting, filtering, and card/table views for all match types.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with navigation cards for all game modes and a link to match history when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin page for viewing and managing user approval statuses and invite-only mode, including approving, rejecting, and bulk rejection.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Displays a player's APA aggregate stats, predictions, and charts with navigation handling and fallbacks when no data exists.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx: Provides a deployment verification page with a checklist and buttons to test navigation to Home and Match History.
frontend/src/pages/stats/StatsPage.tsx: Shows the logged‑in user's aggregated stats across multiple game modes with tabs, charts, and navigation to detailed player stats or history.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Handles an active Straight Shot drill session, persisting progress, validating backend connectivity, and saving completed sessions.
Static panel describing rules and objectives for the Straight Shot drill.
Start page for Straight Shot sessions, managing saved sessions, recent performance stats, and new session initialization.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Utility to extract readable error messages from various unknown or nested error formats.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Provides helper functions for normalizing and comparing player names case‑insensitively.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds the URL path for a player's aggregate stats page using an encoded name.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear hash parameters for routing.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it exceeds the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended colors, typography, container queries, animations, and custom theme settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current build state, constraints, required feature updates, and known issues for surgical changes.
